0: Lovely hotel very nice staff seemed to be a good location
Excellent hotel from staff decor and cleanliness
Major plus points location and staff
The staff was friendly and the breakfast was a bonus
I give it a B It was convenient to find it was easy to park and the customer service was above average
We were also greeted and assisted by other staff in the front desk and each one of them was attentive friendly knowledgeable and very helpful
It is a nice location with a very friendly staff
Otherwise hotel was in a great location service was very good and buffet breakfast was good
1: I will also say that staff interactions while limited were cordial and pleasant
I wholeheartedly believe that the front desk staff would murder someone if it would have made my stay better
Even better there were extra staff just to quickly clear the table and clean for the next guests
Hotel needs in room safe and bell hop service
2: When we reported thisto the front desk we were told that rooms were not cleaned everyday but every other day
I could hear people on the street during the night and also employees in the hallway
Staff did not follow through with a valet request
Staff was dirty walls were paper thin the music from the bar in the hotel itself and the bar next door could be heard until 3 am
It also oils have been nice if they provided bottled water instead of charging 3 at the front desk
But we had two neighbours during our staff in an allotted adjoining room that we had not requested both had small babies which screamed
both the front desk attendants tone and the answer in general should be utterly unacceptable and I ’m shocked and appalled that they would book a room in such close proximity to a night club
